meanings.sent1: After a long day, she dozed off on the couch.
meanings.sent2: The baby dozed peacefully in the crib.
meanings.sent3: As the boring lecture droned on, he dozed off in his seat.
meanings.sent4: The sound of rain outside made her feel like she was dozing in a cozy cocoon.
meanings.sent5: He dozed for a few minutes, feeling refreshed when he woke up.

meanings.definition: To be in a light sleep.
meanings.sent1: The cat dozed lazily in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent2: She dozed fitfully, waking up at every little noise.
meanings.sent3: The dog dozed contentedly by the fireplace, dreaming of chasing squirrels.
meanings.sent4: The old man dozed in his favorite armchair, memories of his youth flickering in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The forest was quiet, the only sound the gentle rustle of leaves as the animals dozed.
